actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide incentive to States for the establishment of a dedicated tax-based source of revenue for funding mass transit systems.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to provide grants from the Mass Transit Account to States that have a general tax-based source of revenues for paying the non-Federal share of mass transportation projects under the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide incentive to States for the establishment of a dedicated tax-based source of revenue for funding mass transit systems.
